alert.note: Alert for Maury; Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 5:24PM CDT until July 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Hickman, Lewis, Maury and Perry. * WHEN...Until 730 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Columbia, Centerville, Linden, Lobelville, Kimmins, Pleasantville, Hampshire, Williamsport, Santa Fe and Mousetail Landing State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
